Package org.cesecore.keys.token

Class CryptoTokenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.keys.token.CryptoTokenFactory
  • public class CryptoTokenFactory
extends Object
    Class managing available Crypto Tokens and instantiated Crypto Tokens. Each CryptoToken plug-in should register itself by using the method register.
    Version:
    $Id: CryptoTokenFactory.java 21361 2015-05-26 11:10:24Z jeklund $

      • getAvailableCryptoTokens

        public Collection<AvailableCryptoToken> getAvailableCryptoTokens()
        Method returning to the system available CryptoToken implementations
        Returns:
        a Collection (AvailableCryptoToken) of registered plug-ins.

      • getAvailableCryptoToken

        public AvailableCryptoToken getAvailableCryptoToken​(String classname)
        Method returning to the available CryptoToken implementations with given classpath.
        Parameters:
        classname - name
        Returns:
        the corresponding AvailableCryptoToken or null of classpath couldn't be found

      • createCryptoToken

        public static final CryptoToken createCryptoToken​(String inClassname,
                                                  Properties properties,
                                                  byte[] data,
                                                  int cryptoTokenId,
                                                  String tokenName)
                                           throws NoSuchSlotException
        Creates a crypto token using reflection to construct the class from classname and initializing the CryptoToken
        Parameters:
        inClassname - the full classname of the crypto token implementation class
        properties - properties passed to the init method of the CryptoToken
        data - byte data passed to the init method of the CryptoToken
        cryptoTokenId - id passed to the init method of the CryptoToken, the id is user defined and not used internally for anything but logging.
        tokenName - user friendly identifier
        Returns:
        token
        Throws:
        NoSuchSlotException - if no slot as defined in properties could be found.

      • createCryptoToken

        public static final CryptoToken createCryptoToken​(String inClassname,
                                                  Properties properties,
                                                  byte[] data,
                                                  int cryptoTokenId,
                                                  String tokenName,
                                                  boolean allowNonExistingSlot)
                                           throws NoSuchSlotException
        Creates a crypto token using reflection to construct the class from classname and initializing the CryptoToken
        Parameters:
        inClassname - the full classname of the crypto token implementation class
        properties - properties passed to the init method of the CryptoToken
        data - byte data passed to the init method of the CryptoToken
        cryptoTokenId - id passed to the init method of the CryptoToken, the id is user defined and not used internally for anything but logging.
        tokenName - user friendly identifier
        allowNonExistingSlot - if the NoSuchSlotException should be used
        Returns:
        token
        Throws:
        NoSuchSlotException - if no slot as defined in properties could be found.
